story.author: Rory Jenkins
story.headline: New Study Finds that Red Staplers are the Fastest
story.subheading: Researchers at the Institute for Office Supply Sciences recently published a study suggesting that red staplers are the fastest staplers.

article.p: Researchers at the IOSS tested of 50 staplers of varying brand and color in an effort to see which could acheive the fastest rate of stapling. Over 100 office workers participated in the study.

This new information has thrown the office supply indusry into a frenzy. Demand for red staplers has sky rocketed. Safety concerns mount as office workers attempt to staple stacks of paper at blistering feeds.
Public outcry has reached a peak as employees who find blue staplers more tasteful are forced to attach their documents with the brighter crimson staplers.
